phrases: The tell-tale sign   of used goods
I will not forgive evil!
Magical Funny Stone!
W-What?!
What is she fighting against in the first place?
Evil.
Like, more specifically...
The Evil Magic Association.
A group trying to use magic to make this world descend into chaos and fear.
An association?
Try harder!
What happens if she loses against them?
Is it even something this girl has to do in the first place?
I do not know about the specifics.
Huh?
Even so, it is still interesting?
You do not even know what they are fighting for.
It cannot be helped!
I only started watching it after I came here, did not I?!
Akiba said he would let me see the first 13 episodes, but not yet.
Hey!
Because you said stuff and distracted me, I did not get to see the good part!
S-Sorry...
No other choice.
Magical Handsome Stone!
Clean up!
Was it like this?
Magical Handsome Stone...
Nice!
That is it!
However, you can learn a lot from the TV.
In order to fight a stronger enemy, we need to power up.
Yeah.
So I was thinking...
My purification wand needs a power up now.
Those are two separate matters.
It is still usable.
Still usable means that it is dangerous.
Besides, you have been playing around too much recently.
Going to karaoke...
Watching TV...
I was thinking of starting again tomorrow.
Say that to my face!
If you do not have anything to feel guilty about.
Anyway, those kinds of goods are replaced randomly to prevent the viewers from getting bored.
Just fix it up and keep using it.
Got it?
What?
Magical Handsome Stone.
Clean up.
Hey!
If you eat all of the chicken from the lunch box, all we are going to have is rice!
I cannot understand a word you are saying!
Give it back!
I have an important announcement today!
Actually, I, Zange-chan, am making a CD at the moment!
Ah!
Does that mean you will be making your debut as a singer?
No, that has not been decided yet.
So I am recruiting a studio to help me debut!
Here is the address.
Hey, Zange-chan!
Please do not use our program without approval!
I have already made the lyrics and music, so please help me!
That karaoke must have gotten to her.
Honestly, she is too impressionable to be a god.
You are one to talk...
Hello?
How dare a man like you be together with Zange-chan...
I can make her much happier!
So do not-
What is the matter?
Just a prank call.
There have been a lot lately.
All regarding Zange-chan.
Being a playboy must be tough.
Hey, in the first place, you-
Hello?
A man like you is not suited for my Daitetsu-kun!
The only one who can understand his feelings is me!
Hey!
Now, then...
I guess I will take a bath.
After all, I will be busy exterminating impurities from tomorrow on.
You are doing that on purpose!
Quite some time has passed since then.
I am out now.
Jin!
Jin.
Well, yeah.
If it is around 3,000 yen, you can buy it.
After school tomorrow.
It is fine.
Eh?
This is fine.
Starting tomorrow, I will exorcise like crazy again with this!
I am counting on you too!
Eh?
I do not know!
I will not forgive evil!
Take this!
Nagi!
Ouch!
S-Sorry!
Jin!
Jin!
Ouch...
I have such bad luck...
Look, that is him!
The one in the love square!
That bisexual guy?
Is that for real?
I heard it is his camouflage.
He does not look too bright.
Why does he look all messed up?
So that is what a battlefield is like.
Jin!
Daitetsu.
I have said this many times, but being with Nagi-san is-
It might be better if I did not see you for a while.
What?
Just beware of that woman!
Got it?
It is ugly jealousy.
So he is bisexual!
Mikuriya's popular season has arrived.
Popular season?
Yes.
The popular season is...
It is said to come once in a lifetime, regardless of character or physical appearance.
But the scary thing is the counter-reaction that results.
If people go through extremely popular seasons when they are young,
it is said that they will never be popular again when they are adults.
In other words, a physiognomy of troubles with women.
Certainly, there have been some instances that reflect that.
For example, the injury you got today.
Do not you think it is unbelievable that you would just fall out of the window due to carelessness?
Th-This is...
Now that you mention it, you have been getting a lot of injuries, lately.
You usually have a bandage on.
Jin is just too wild with his own body.
Even though I always tell him to take care of himself...
Is something possessing you?
Do not say unpleasant things like that.
Something possessed, eh?
Let me exorcise that for you!
Troubles with women?
A popular season, eh?
A high school boy should be dancing for joy in this kind of situation.
Is Mikuriya a blockhead?
He lives with Nagi-sama at home.
Tsugumi-chan and Zange-chan come up to him at school!
What kind of event flag filled school life is this?!
This would be a situation where I could not stop drooling!
It cannot be helped if some girl he does not like comes up to him.
If he had a true love...
What is going on?
Calling me out to a place like this...
I have reached my boiling point...!
Whether it is being a homo, a bisexual, or covered in bandages,
it is all your damn fault!
Oh.
Yeah.
I will admit that.
Troubles with women?
I think it might be true.
Come to think of it, Tsugumi saw my precious last time.
Your precious?
At this rate, I will be killed!
I demand better treatment of myself!
I have been putting up with things up until now, but that is going to change starting today!
What is with you all of a sudden?
I have believed in you as a god,
but my body will not be able to take it at this rate!
From now on, do not do anything without consulting me first.
Although it is my fault for not questioning you until now.
We have gone a long way without making things clear.
First of all, what do you want to do that requires you to stay at my house?
Make that clear, please.
It is exactly as I have been saying up to now.
I am here to exorcise impurities.
Gathering belief is for that purpose as well.
I do not really understand this impurity thing.
What is it?
Something that can be found anywhere?
It does not look like a spider or a centipede for sure.
It is not normal for them to look like insects.
So it is not normal to have this many insects?
That is right.
Only in our town?
That is right.
Why?
Who knows.
Do you mean you do not know?
You cannot not know.
They just appeared all of a sudden?
I do not know...
You do not even know when they first appeared?
I do not really know.
It seems like you are hiding something from me.
Then let me at least ask you this.
Why do they look like insects?
It was a moth today, right?
I do not know.
I see.
So, why is it bad when impurities show up?
Bad things happen when they possess you.
I become impure when I touch them.
So, you are exorcising impurities that are here for some unknown reason...
What the hell is that?
That is no different from that anime yesterday.
Have you ever thought about why you are even doing this?
Shut up!
What is with you?!
I told you not to ask!
Have you forgotten already, bird-brain?!
She got mad again.
This always happens when we talk about stuff like this.
You have always been evading my questions like that,
but it are not going to work today!
I am the one getting hurt here!
At least give me a reason!
If you do not know, then think about it!
Nagi-san?
Hey, hey.
Yeah, I heard about it.
Who knows.
What kind of reaction was that?
Like pushing on a curtain.
Like driving a stake into rice brans.
It is so hazy.
What is this feeling?
Everything is left unclear and ambiguous.
I think you should pull yourself together.
I am sorry!
I am sorry!
My mistake.
I heard rumors that you were triple-timing my daughter.
My emotions got the better of me.
How about some tea?
No, as long as you no longer misunderstand, I am okay...
I have had enough...
So that was your circumstances.
I thought it was strange as well.
My daughter choosing a man like you...
Umm... Sensei...
I would like to ask your advice about something.
It is actually about Nagi.
Oh, about Nagi-kun?
Is it something I can help you with?
What is it?
She is a god!
A god?
She said so herself.
Stupid Jin...
Why am I so irritated?
I see...
So she is a god.
This is the first time I have heard that she was a god.
Was she a god?
Yes.
Well...
A god, huh?
A god...
Umm...
I have heard stories like this before.
Should I say... she is a bit too receptive?
There are people whose personalities change due to certain incidents.
There is a theory that it is a mental disorder,
while others call it spiritual.
I do not really know.
Some call it being possessed by demons or a spiritual medium.
But there are times when the other personality tells lies...
In the name of gods or demons.
Is Nagi a ghost?
I cannot make conclusions with words like that...
But I have heard that lowly spirits try to pass themselves off as noble beings.
Of course, I have not concluded that she is one.
I just gave an example.
But what if that were the case?
What should I do?
If we consider occurrences from overseas, there are possible methods such as exorcism.
But they are...
They?
I do not think they are anything evil.
Nagi-kun materialized from the statue made from the sacred tree, right?
Yes... well...
Japan's Shintoism has more diverse beliefs compared to those of other religions.
Should I say free-thinking?
There are fewer laws like the belief of an absolute god, or the prohibition of idol worshiping.
First off, there are no other cases of having infinite gods.
To face up to them,
the first thing to do is to understand their identity clearly.
Identity you say...
I do not think they are evil.
But even if they call themselves gods, we cannot be sure.
But Nagi herself says that she is a god.
She only says that herself.
Do you have any clues?
Or any proof that she might be a god?
I cannot refute that.
She definitely looks mundane.
From what I see, her actions and words are quite ambiguous and vague.
That might be how she got used to this lifestyle.
This is what I think.
Either they are speaking of gods solely for their own ends,
or they falsely believe that they themselves are gods.
The soil here is my body.
My followers are my beloved children.
They are all cute.
I love them all.
How cute they are.
How happy they are.
Grow up healthy.
That is enough to satisfy me.
How fun this is.
How happy I am.
Being a god is a good thing.
Ouch.
For the sake of the land, I have to exorcise the impurities.
They are troublesome.
Only in our town?
Why?
Well, who cares.
He does not understand himself?
That is right.
Jin joined the arts club saying he wanted to search for himself.
Although I think it is pointless to just copy Daitetsu-kun...
You will not understand yourself in just 15 years.
Yeah, you are right.
I do not understand either.
But I hope he finds what he is looking for.
I wonder how you can find it.
There is no point in thinking about it, right?
Eh?
When you do not know what to do, you should just act according to your emotion and intuition.
That is what I always do.
Yes.
Trying to think about things I do not understand is meaningless.
Act according to emotion and intuition.
Act according to emotion and intuition.
Geez.
I always have to bear the brunt of your selfish actions.
You understand?
I do not have any choice after all.
Thinking about this is meaningless.
Why will not you explain it to me?
When I am looking after you so much!
Shut up!
Do not ask me that!
I do not have to think about things I do not know!
Being here!
Living like this!
What is wrong with that?!
What do you want me to do?!
Are you going to doubt me as a god?
You are always evading my questions like that,
but it are not going to work today!
At least tell me the reason!
Think about it if you do not know!
I see...
I do not even know the answer myself...
I was not aware of the very fact that...
I know nothing about myself.
In any case, if you do not know anything about her, you should find out.
Excuse me.
She claims to be a god, yet you know nothing about her...
How could you have lived with something unknown like that for so long?
I guess I am not one to talk though...
Eh?!
Only this?
The enshrined deity is unknown?
This unknown identity is going way too far.
How am I supposed to find this out?
If there is nothing in the official records...
I will have to go directly to the related people.
Huh?
Nagi?
Next time on Kannagi...
What happened, Jin?
